name: ss2abi
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mpgbir(s0, wss(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wss(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1))
-| wb(wss(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1))
-| wb(wss(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, w1)

body.origin: |- wb(wss(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1)), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cab(s0, w0), cab(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, w1)

comment: Inference of abstraction subclass from implication. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1995.)
